segments.text: I can't believe my eyes , Bill . Are you having a salad for lunch ? No hamburger ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get used to it , Mary . I'm off hamburgers for good health . Most fast food is loaded with sodium .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . But why are you suddenly interested in lessening your salt intake ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My doctor says I should cut back on sodium-rich foods to lower my blood pressure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have hypertension ? I would have thought you were too young .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , my blood pressure isn't that high yet , but they say it increases with age .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I'm glad you're starting to pay more attention to your diet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to lower my risk of heart attack and stroke , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So do I . That's why I've been trying to lower my cholesterol level .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've noticed you've been munching away on lots of fruits and vegetables recently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's right . I could stand to lose a few pounds , too .
segments.speaker: S1
